{"database_schema": ""Description for table: DelegatedStake"
type DelegatedStake @entity {
  "Description for column: id"
  id: ID!
  "Description for column: indexer"
  indexer: Indexer!
  "Description for column: delegator"
  delegator: Delegator!
  "Description for column: stakedTokens"
  stakedTokens: BigInt!
  "Description for column: unstakedTokens"
  unstakedTokens: BigInt!
  "Description for column: lockedTokens"
  lockedTokens: BigInt!
  "Description for column: lockedUntil"
  lockedUntil: Int!
  "Description for column: shareAmount"
  shareAmount: BigInt!
  "Description for column: personalExchangeRate"
  personalExchangeRate: BigDecimal!
  "Description for column: realizedRewards"
  realizedRewards: BigDecimal!
  "Description for column: createdAt"
  createdAt: Int!
  "Description for column: lastDelegatedAt"
  lastDelegatedAt: Int
  "Description for column: lastUndelegatedAt"
  lastUndelegatedAt: Int
  "Description for column: transferredToL2"
  transferredToL2: Boolean!
  "Description for column: transferredToL2At"
  transferredToL2At: BigInt
  "Description for column: transferredToL2AtBlockNumber"
  transferredToL2AtBlockNumber: BigInt
  "Description for column: transferredToL2AtTx"
  transferredToL2AtTx: String
  "Description for column: stakedTokensTransferredToL2"
  stakedTokensTransferredToL2: BigInt!
  "Description for column: idOnL2"
  idOnL2: String
  "Description for column: idOnL1"
  idOnL1: String
}"}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
{"documented_schema": ""Description for table: DelegatedStake"
type DelegatedStake @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the delegated stake."
  id: ID!
  "Reference to the indexer associated with the stake."
  indexer: Indexer!
  "Reference to the delegator who has staked tokens."
  delegator: Delegator!
  "Total number of tokens currently staked."
  stakedTokens: BigInt!
  "Total number of tokens that have been unstaked."
  unstakedTokens: BigInt!
  "Total number of tokens that are locked."
  lockedTokens: BigInt!
  "Timestamp until which the tokens are locked."
  lockedUntil: Int!
  "Amount of shares corresponding to the staked tokens."
  shareAmount: BigInt!
  "Exchange rate specific to the delegator's stake."
  personalExchangeRate: BigDecimal!
  "Rewards that have been realized from the stake."
  realizedRewards: BigDecimal!
  "Timestamp when the stake was created."
  createdAt: Int!
  "Timestamp of the last delegation action."
  lastDelegatedAt: Int
  "Timestamp of the last undelegation action."
  lastUndelegatedAt: Int
  "Indicates if the stake has been transferred to Layer 2."
  transferredToL2: Boolean!
  "Timestamp when the stake was transferred to Layer 2."
  transferredToL2At: BigInt
  "Block number at which the transfer to Layer 2 occurred."
  transferredToL2AtBlockNumber: BigInt
  "Transaction ID for the transfer to Layer 2."
  transferredToL2AtTx: String
  "Amount of staked tokens transferred to Layer 2."
  stakedTokensTransferredToL2: BigInt!
  "Identifier for the stake on Layer 2."
  idOnL2: String
  "Identifier for the stake on Layer 1."
  idOnL1: String
}"}

    reasoning = Field(annotation=str required=True json_schema_extra={'prefix': "Reasoning: Let's think step by step in order to", 'desc': '${reasoning}', '__dspy_field_type': 'output'})
    documented_schema = Field(annotation=str required=True json_schema_extra={'desc': 'The database schema with proper documentation, ensuring that the underlying schema is not altered.', '__dspy_field_type': 'output', 'prefix': 'Documented Schema:'})
)", "completion": "[[ ## reasoning ## ]]
The provided GraphQL schema defines a single entity, `DelegatedStake`, with various fields. Each field is already accompanied by a brief description, which is intended to document the purpose or nature of the field. The task is to ensure that these descriptions are clear and concise, providing enough context for someone reading the schema to understand what each field represents without altering the underlying schema structure.

[[ ## documented_schema ## ]]
"Description for table: DelegatedStake"
type DelegatedStake @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the delegated stake."
  id: ID!
  "Reference to the indexer associated with the stake."
  indexer: Indexer!
  "Reference to the delegator who has staked tokens."
  delegator: Delegator!
  "Total number of tokens currently staked."
  stakedTokens: BigInt!
  "Total number of tokens that have been unstaked."
  unstakedTokens: BigInt!
  "Total number of tokens that are locked."
  lockedTokens: BigInt!
  "Timestamp until which the tokens are locked."
  lockedUntil: Int!
  "Amount of shares corresponding to the staked tokens."
  shareAmount: BigInt!
  "Exchange rate specific to the delegator's stake."
  personalExchangeRate: BigDecimal!
  "Rewards that have been realized from the stake."
  realizedRewards: BigDecimal!
  "Timestamp when the stake was created."
  createdAt: Int!
  "Timestamp of the last delegation action."
  lastDelegatedAt: Int
  "Timestamp of the last undelegation action."
  lastUndelegatedAt: Int
  "Indicates if the stake has been transferred to Layer 2."
  transferredToL2: Boolean!
  "Timestamp when the stake was transferred to Layer 2."
  transferredToL2At: BigInt
  "Block number at which the transfer to Layer 2 occurred."
  transferredToL2AtBlockNumber: BigInt
  "Transaction ID for the transfer to Layer 2."
  transferredToL2AtTx: String
  "Amount of staked tokens transferred to Layer 2."
  stakedTokensTransferredToL2: BigInt!
  "Identifier for the stake on Layer 2."
  idOnL2: String
  "Identifier for the stake on Layer 1."
  idOnL1: String
}

[[ ## completed ## ]]"}

    instructions="You are a documentation quality evaluator specializing in GraphQL schemas. Your task is to assess the quality of documentation provided for a given database schema. Carefully analyze the schema's descriptions for clarity, accuracy, and completeness. Categorize the documentation into one of the following ratings based on your evaluation: \n- perfect (4): The documentation is comprehensive and leaves no room for ambiguity in understanding the schema and its database content.\n- almost perfect (3): The documentation is clear and mostly free of ambiguity, but there is potential for further improvement.\n- poor but correct (2): The documentation is correct but lacks detail, resulting in some ambiguity. It requires enhancement to be more informative.\n- incorrect (1): The documentation contains errors or misleading information, regardless of any correct segments present. Such inaccuracies necessitate an incorrect rating.\nProvide a step-by-step reasoning to support your evaluation, along with the appropriate category label and numerical rating."

)", "demos": [], "inputs": {"database_schema": ""Description for table: DelegatedStake"

response:
{"documented_schema": ""Description for table: DelegatedStake"
type DelegatedStake @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the delegated stake."
  id: ID!
  "Reference to the indexer associated with the stake."
  indexer: Indexer!
  "Reference to the delegator who has staked tokens."
  delegator: Delegator!
  "Total number of tokens currently staked."
  stakedTokens: BigInt!
  "Total number of tokens that have been unstaked."
  unstakedTokens: BigInt!
  "Total number of tokens that are locked."
  lockedTokens: BigInt!
  "Timestamp until which the tokens are locked."
  lockedUntil: Int!
  "Amount of shares corresponding to the staked tokens."
  shareAmount: BigInt!
  "Exchange rate specific to the delegator's stake."
  personalExchangeRate: BigDecimal!
  "Rewards that have been realized from the stake."
  realizedRewards: BigDecimal!
  "Timestamp when the stake was created."
  createdAt: Int!
  "Timestamp of the last delegation action."
  lastDelegatedAt: Int
  "Timestamp of the last undelegation action."
  lastUndelegatedAt: Int
  "Indicates if the stake has been transferred to Layer 2."
  transferredToL2: Boolean!
  "Timestamp when the stake was transferred to Layer 2."
  transferredToL2At: BigInt
  "Block number at which the transfer to Layer 2 occurred."
  transferredToL2AtBlockNumber: BigInt
  "Transaction ID for the transfer to Layer 2."
  transferredToL2AtTx: String
  "Amount of staked tokens transferred to Layer 2."
  stakedTokensTransferredToL2: BigInt!
  "Identifier for the stake on Layer 2."
  idOnL2: String
  "Identifier for the stake on Layer 1."
  idOnL1: String
}"}
